Articles.Content:
Hi all

I stumbled apron this game on steam and thought, uhh.. I wanna try that.. "click BUY"..

It started off slowly with a few small rockets and then they got bigger... Then I found out, that this game is much more than just building rockets! Wow..

I cannot wait to see the final game once it gets there :-)

Btw, I'm from Denmark and you wont get rid of me easily..

Yours

Jones
Hello and welcome to the forums! Glad to see you here!
